name: Golden Gate Park Hotel
proximityToAttractions: Located in the heart of San Francisco, within walking distance to Golden Gate Park, de Young Museum, and Academy of Sciences
neighborhoodSafety: Safe neighborhood with low crime rates and security cameras in the hotel premises
accessibility: Easy access to public transportation, major highways, and airport
wifi: Free high-speed wifi in all rooms and public areas
breakfast: Complimentary breakfast buffet with a variety of options
poolAndSpa: Outdoor pool and spa facilities for relaxation
climateControl: Individual climate control in all rooms
recentReview: Excellent service, great location, and comfortable rooms
familyFriendly: Family-friendly amenities and connecting rooms available
petPolicy: Pet-friendly hotel with designated pet areas
shuttleService: Complimentary shuttle service to major attractions
parking: Valet parking available for an additional fee
safetyAndSecurity: 24/7 security surveillance and secure keycard access to rooms
ambianceAndDecor: Elegantly designed interiors with a modern and sophisticated ambiance
businessAmenities: Business center and meeting rooms for corporate guests
viewAndSurroundings: Panoramic views of Golden Gate Park and San Francisco skyline
noiseLevel: Soundproof rooms for a peaceful stay
